Summary: Sort Of Like A Bright Glowing Blimp.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around August 21st 2007
divs: sighting detailsso my dad was outside in the backyard making bbq when he looked up at a plain flying by, then he looked to the right an noticed a bright circular\unknown object near it. it looked way too high to be a blimp or a plain. so we went to the garage to get the binocular's to get a closer look. we couldnt figure out what it could of been, nothing a human could be in cause it seemed way to high to be anything piloted by a person. it made us frightened in a way casue it just seemed so strange and unknown.
